content.question: Although the function of Stonehenge has been debated by scholars, newer archaeological evidence suggests that it may have acted as

choices.label: a platform for displaying important ancestral sculptures
an early amphitheater for watching fights between warriors
a royal estate for housing rulers and the elite
a center for pilgrimage and healing of the sick

content.answer: a center for pilgrimage and healing of the sick

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
